headline: Has Norfolk Southern’s 24.9% 2025 Rally Already Priced In Its Efficiency Gains?
summary: Wondering if Norfolk Southern is still worth buying after its strong run, or if the easy money has already been made? Let us unpack what the current price really implies about its long term value. The stock has climbed about 1.1% over the last week, 3.1% over the last month, and a hefty 24.9% year to date, leaving many investors asking whether this momentum is justified or if expectations are getting ahead of reality. Recent headlines have focused on the railroad's ongoing network efficiency...
